import React from 'react' function Wishhandler() { const addWishlistHandler = () => { const existingWishlist = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('wishlist')) || [] const newWishlist = [...existingWishlist, { id: product._id, name: product.name, image: product.image, price: product.price }] localStorage.setItem('wishlist', JSON.stringify(newWishlist)) setWishlist(newWishlist) } return (
Wishhandler
) } export default Wishhandler
